last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 20
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ji Hyun is able to recall her adventure during the past 49 days and receives a visit from Yi Soo, but why?

name: 49 Days
overview: Shin Ji-hyun was enjoying absolute bliss as she was about to marry her fiancé, Kang Min-ho, but her perfect life is shattered when she gets into a car accident that leaves her in a coma. She is given a second chance at life by a reaper, but it comes with a condition: she has to find three people outside of her family who would cry genuine tears for her. In order to do this, she borrows the body of Song Yi-kyung, a part-time employee at a convenience store for 49 days.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Gullible yet cheerful Shin Ji-hyun is living a perfect life: she is the only daughter of wealthy, doting parents and is surrounded by supportive best friends. She is also engaged to be married to the perfect man, Kang Min-ho, in just a few weeks. Meanwhile, Song Yi-kyung is in an existential crisis following her boyfriend's tragic death. She works third shift at a convenience store, sleeps in the afternoon, and often spends what little time she has left in the day contemplating suicide.

tagline: Do you have three people who truly love you?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Shin Ji Hyun prepares for her wedding to Kang Min Ho, but an unfortunate accident causes her to end up brain-dead in a coma.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Ji Hyun relishes her new body when she possesses Song Yi Kyung. She applies for a job at Han Kang's restaurant.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ji Hyun discovers Min Ho and In Jung's affair behind her back, and their schemes against her father's company.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Desperate to thwart Min Ho and In Jung, Ji Hyun races to find her seal. She learns of her best friend and fiance's long history together.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Depressed about her reality, the Scheduler takes Ji Hyun shopping to cheer her up. Meanwhile, Min Ho can't shake off a growing attraction towards Yi Kyung.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Han Kang continually butts heads with Yi Kyung, who continually reminds him of Ji Hyun, in an attempt to cover his feelings.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Ji Hyun becomes Min Ho's housemaid using Yi Kyung's body, but her activities lead to negative consequences for the real Yi Kyung.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Yi Kyung's presence at Min Ho's home unsettles In Jung. Meanwhile, Han Kang can't forget Yi Kyung despite firing her.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Ji Hyun's father's brain tumor worsens, prompting him to write up a new will leaving the company to Min Ho.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Her 49 days almost halfway over, Ji Hyun faces the very possible reality that no one around her truly loves her.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Ji Hyun goes on a search to thank the person who cried for her, while Kang searches for the truth about Ji Hyun/Yi Kyung.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Ji Hyun starts to lose control of Yi Kyung during the day, which leaves Yi Kyung confused. Yi Kyung takes a stroll on memory lane.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Worried that Kang is onto her secret, Ji Hyun is more determined to take care of the Min Ho situation before her 49 days.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Ji Hyun learns about the Scheduler's past and confronts him about it, which causes him to put things in perspective.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Yi Kyung recounts her backstory for Dr. Noh, but they are not alone. Kang takes Ji Hyun to visit her father in the hospital.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Yi Soo recounts his heartbreaking his past with Yi Kyung. Kang and Min Ho fight over Ji Hyun while Seo Woo confronts In Jung with the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Both Kang and Ji Hyun race to stop Yi Kyung from running away. Min Ho tries to exorcise Ji Hyun's spirit.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Kang and Ji Hyun deliver the seal to her mother and attempt to tell her father about Min Ho. Yi Kyung also receives gifts from Ji Hyun.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Ji Hyun receives her third tear which allows her to wake up from her coma.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Ji Hyun is able to recall her adventure during the past 49 days and receives a visit from Yi Soo, but why?

1.name: Season 1

She is also engaged to be married to the perfect man, Kang Min-ho, in just a few weeks. Meanwhile, Song Yi-kyung is in an existential crisis following her boyfriend's tragic death. She works third shift at a convenience store, sleeps in the afternoon, and often spends what little time she has left in the day contemplating suicide.
